foods.name: Powered DOM-Nuts
foods.description: Soft golden rings of cake covered with powdered sugar. These scrumptious DOMS are a perfect ending to any meal or as a snack on the go!

foods.name: Sour Cream and Microchips
foods.description: Fresh herbs and spices mixed with the creamiest sour cream. Served with hearty potatoes freshly sliced when you order.

foods.name: Sea Shark
foods.description: Baked shark steak perfectly balanced with an herb-butter sauce and slightly sweet.

foods.name: Java Shrimp
foods.description: You donâ€™t always have to drink your coffee, you can eat it too! Jumbo shrimp marinated in espresso roasted over an open flame producing a nice smokey flavor.

foods.name: Root Water
foods.description: Quench your thirst! Carrots and Beets blended in harmony producing a satisfying juice. Order by the gallon or in store free refills.

foods.name: Mozzarella Mega Bites
foods.description: Our signature fried mozzarella sticks, served with marinara sauce & roasted garlic aioli.

foods.name: Arrays and Beans
foods.description: For every bean, there is either a bean plus one or one bean less. Served in a cornbread bowl with a zesty sauce.

foods.name: WiFi Rice
foods.description: A vegetable-studded bowl you won't want to put down! Make it a hearty entree with your choice of chicken, beef, shrimp, or not.

foods.name: SQ-L-T Sandwich
foods.description: A toasties-hero with thinly sliced squash, lightly oiled and grilled dressed with limes and vine ripened tomatoes

foods.name: Slice of Pie Thon
foods.description: Our thon takes pecans to the next level. The bottom crust is topped with a delicious pecan custard, another crust and more pecans. You won't want to share this with anyone!

foods.name: Sass Tea
foods.description: An incredibly unique looking beverage, Sass tea is a blend of tea with milk, fruit and fruit juices, and yummy tapioca pearls.

foods.name: !Async Coffee
foods.description: A rich blend of dark roasted coffe. Our secret is to simultaneously mix the coffee half and half with hot milk. Pairs perfectly with Powered DOM-Nuts

foods.name: Git'n Grits
foods.description: Fried git'n breasts prepared the 'Hot Nashville' way with goat cheese grits. Served with maple hot sauce and pickled chiles.
